links.title: Remove (Pattern Day Trader) Regulations | We the People: Your Voice in Our Government
links.description: PDT (pattern day trading) regulations and rules for stock traders are discriminatory towards people without large amounts of cash on hand. The rule states you must have a minimum of $25,000 in your brokerage account in order to be a PDT which allows unlimited day trades with 4X margin.

links.title: FANG Stocks: Trade Dead As Facebook, Amazon, Netflix, Google Lead Tech Woes?
links.description: Tech stocks have been getting clobbered lately, leaving many on Wall Street to wonder if the once-leading FANG stocks - Facebook, Amazon, Netflix and Google parent Alphabet - are finally out of favor. The outsized influence of top tech stocks in the S&P 500 could be cause for investor concern.

links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

message.body: Netflix, Square, Splunk Led 5 Top Stocks Making This Bullish Move As Dow Jones, S&P 500 Rallied: https://www.investors.com/research/top-stocks-netflix-square-splunk-top-50-day-line/  $NFLX $SQ $SPLK

links.title: Top Stocks: Netflix, Square Led 5 Winners As Dow Jones, S&P 500 Rallied
links.description: Top stocks Netflix ( NFLX), Square ( SQ), Splunk ( SPLK), Diamondback Energy ( FANG) and E-Trade Financial ( ETFC) found support at their 50-day moving averages in Thursday's stock market rebound. They all rallied above the key level in heavy volume as the S&P 500 index and Dow Jones industrial average shot up more than 2%.
